chefmod:Lab.NAME: 药水实验室 —— 重置
DESCRIPTIONS: 你发现自己在你的旧 ~药水~ ~实验室。~ NL NL 有一些剩余的药水躺在那里，但你不知道你的珍贵财产是否仍然安全。你检查了它的隐藏隔间的门上的封条，确认它仍然安全。
OPTIONS: [打开秘密隔间] 失去所有药剂，拿走你 #g珍贵的财产。

chefmod:WomanInBlue.NAME: 蓝衣女人 —— 重置
DESCRIPTIONS: 从黑暗中，一只手臂把你拉进了一家小店。当你的眼睛适应后，你看到一个穿着利落的苍白女子在向一墙的药水指指点点。 NL "你!" 她呼喊着。 "算了，赶紧买瓶药水，现在！"

chefmod:JunkPileEvent.NAME: 垃圾堆
DESCRIPTIONS: 在城市里一座倒塌的公寓后面，你发现了一座巨大的废弃垃圾堆。 NL NL 看来这里的垃圾已经堆了很多年了。不知道在这些无用的垃圾中，能不能找到有用的材料。
Digging through the ~Junk,~ you discover a few common ingredients, but you suspect that deeper in you will be able to find something rarer...
Deeper in the pile, you find some cast-off ~machine~ ~parts~ that could be useful, but you sense some powerful energy even deeper in...

At last, you find some rare ingredients - An #p~Enchanted~ #p~Book~ that could entrance an enemy, an old #r~Train~ #r~Ticket~ filled with dark energy, a #g~Treasure~ #g~Chest~ that uses gold against your foes, and a #y~Shining~ #y~Moth~ that empowers future attacks.
You turn around and leave with your find.
OPTIONS: [Collect Train Ticket] Damage based on floor number.
[Collect Treasure Chest] Damage foes based on gold.
[Collect Radiance] Stack additional damage on your next attack.
